title: Kawhi Signs An Extension, NBA Summer League Reaction
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps discuss Kawhi signing a surprise 4-year extension, the key takeaway’s from the NBA Summer League so far, which young rookies have impressed, the potential on the Rockets in the future, Evan Mobley’s potential talent and Dennis Schroder’s contract with Boston.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Kawhi's Extension, NBA Summer League Main Takeaways
